message.body: Is this a chef Michelle masterpiece?
Lol yea but you'll never guess what I did to the chicken!!!
I cooked it in the bacon jam you bought Steph for xmas. Was amazing!
Are you serious?? Haha that sounds great

Yes dead serious! Opened the fridge to see what I can do. I wanted bbq sauce but we don't have any. Saw the bacon jam and was like "hmm I can work with that"... do grilled up the chicken in a lol oil and added thr jam to marinate it in It
I'm glad you liked it. And I'm assuming Steph did too?
